title: Analyze Client Financial Data
description: An agent must analyze a client's financial statements (CSV) to identify trends in profitability and liquidity.

tasks.description: Load the provided CSV of financial data and calculate key financial ratios (e.g., Gross Profit Margin, Current Ratio) for the last 5 years.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly calculates the financial ratios for each year.

tasks.description: Identify the year-over-year trend for each calculated ratio.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies trends, such as 'Gross Profit Margin has been decreasing since 2022'.

tasks.description: Generate a summary report highlighting the key findings, such as declining profitability and improving liquidity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a concise text summary of the financial health trends.
